info.title: Ad API
info.description:
COMMON HEADER PARAMETERS
- `AccessManagerAccountNo`: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account. If the manager account's permission level is `member`, this value must be included to make an API request to ad accounts.

parameters.name: AccessManagerAccountNo
parameters.description: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account

parameters.name: activated
parameters.description: Indicates whether ad groups are turned on or off. If not specified, it gets all ad groups.

parameters.name: deleteOnly
parameters.description: Gets only the deleted ad groups. If true, it gets only the deleted ad groups; if false, it gets the ad groups that are `RUNNABLE`, `BEFORE-STARTING`, or `TERMINATED`.

parameters.name: AccessManagerAccountNo
parameters.description: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account

parameters.description: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account

parameters.name: activated
parameters.description: Turns ad groups on or off. (Set this to true to turn them on.)

parameters.name: AccessManagerAccountNo
parameters.description: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account

parameters.name: activated
parameters.description: If true or false, it gets only the campaigns that are turned on or off, respectively.  If not specified, it gets all campaigns.

parameters.name: deleteOnly
parameters.description: Gets only the deleted ad groups. If not true, the deleted campaigns are excluded from the results.

parameters.name: objectives
parameters.description: Gets campaigns that match the specified objectives. If not specified, it gets all campaigns.

parameters.name: activated
parameters.description: Indicates whether creatives are turned on. If true or false, it gets only the creatives that are turned on or off, respectively. If not specified, it gets all creatives.

parameters.name: deleteOnly
parameters.description: Indicates whether to get only the deleted creatives. If true, it gets only the deleted creatives.

delete.description:
HTTP status code description
- Error 400 no creative exists, or the creative does not belong to the ad account, or the creative has already been deleted

parameters.name: AccessManagerAccountNo
parameters.description: Manager account ID that has access to the ad account

post.description: 현재, 소재타입 `네이티브 이미지`의 소재 생성이 가능합니다.

HTTP status code description
- Error 400 no creative exists
- Error 400 draftCreativeNos does not exist
- Error 422 & error.code='CONDITION_DOES_NOT_MEET' : Cannot edit the creative

adAccountNo.description: Ad account ID with its brand registered

favorites.description: Indicates whether it is added as a favorite.

accelerated.description: Delivery method indicating whether to accelerate ad delivery.

allDevice.description: Indicates whether to select all eligible devices.

allPlacementGroup.description: Indicates whether to select all eligible ad placement.

bidStrategy.description:
How to manage costs
- Available values: `FIXED_BID`,`BID_CAP`,`COST_CAP`,`NO_CAP`

ongoing.description: Indicates whether to continue to show ads.

activated.description: Indicates whether ad groups are turned on or off.

allPlacementGroup.description: Indicates whether to select all eligible ad placement.

- Available values: `FIXED_BID`,`BID_CAP`,`COST_CAP`,`NO_CAP`

- Available values: `FIXED_BID`,`BID_CAP`,`COST_CAP`,`NO_CAP`

activated.description: Indicates whether the campaign is turned on or off.

appName.description: App name. It is still present for old data, but is not available.

budgetExhausted.description: Indicates whether the budget limit is reached.

catalogAvailable.description: Indicates whether a catalog is availabe.
